sentences.en: A sick dog is as much a dependant as a sick child.
sentences.cn: “狗儿生病就像孩子生病一样需要人照顾. ”

sentences.en: ADC results are dependant on the setting of the decimal flag.
sentences.cn: ADC的结果取决于D标志的设定.

sentences.en: Companies with 200 or more workers must offer health benefits to employees and their dependants.
sentences.cn: 员工数为200或更多的公司必须为其员工和员工的受扶养人提供健康福利。

sentences.en: Dependant on their position in the circuit they can meter - in meter - out or bleed - off control.
sentences.cn: 依靠他们在回路中的位置,可提供量入量出和旁伸控制.

sentences.en: Dependant on their position in the circuit they can provide meter - in, meter - out or bleed - off control.
sentences.cn: 依赖它们在回路中的位置可作量入, 量出,旁伸控制.

sentences.en: I am little better than a dependant.
sentences.cn: 我比寄人篱下的仆从好不了多少.

sentences.en: In test instruments, resolution of the system is dependant on spectral purity of the monochrometer.
sentences.cn: 在测试仪器中, 单色器的光谱纯度决定系统的分辨率.

sentences.en: In the present study, we tested the dose - dependant enhancement of the anti - tumor effect induced by DCs.
sentences.cn: 在目前的研究中, 我们检测了依赖于树突状细胞所诱导的 抗肿瘤 效果的增强效应.

sentences.en: Note that this is higly dependant on playstyle and personal preference.
sentences.cn: 注意,这个评价很大程度上由玩法和个人喜好所决定.

sentences.en: The crystallization property of PPS is dependant on relative molecular weight markedly.
sentences.cn: PPS相对分子质量对结晶性能的影响很敏感.

sentences.en: The dependent dependant cannot live independently.
sentences.cn: 依靠别人的被赡养者不能独立生活.

sentences.en: The extent of isomerization is related to chain element construction, but not dependant on molecular weight.
sentences.cn: 其异构化程度与聚酯分子链节结构有关, 与分子量大小无关.

sentences.en: The performance of your code is directly dependant on the number of instructions in your shader.
sentences.cn: 你的代码的效率直接由你的着色程序里的指令数决定.

sentences.en: They were all dependant relatives of the comprador.
sentences.cn: 他们通常是跟买办有关系的人.

sentences.en: This build order is timing dependant. Get Tier 2 as quickly as possible.
sentences.cn: 这个建造序列依赖于时机. 尽可能快的造二级单位.

sentences.en: This is all dependant on the mother and where the energies cause plate movement.
sentences.cn: 这完全取决你们的母亲地球和引起板块运动的能量的位置.

words.tran_cn: 依靠的；从属的；取决于…的

trans.tran_cn: 家眷，侍从，食客，受赡养者，寄人篱下的仆从
trans.tran_en: someone, especially a child, who depends on you for food, clothes, money etc
